common_1020_hakase_07a:
If you utilize [VAR PKNAME(0001)]’s gliding capabilities,
you should be able to descend into the depths\r
to reach Area Zero.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1020_hakase_07b:

you should be able to descend into the depths\r

common_1020_botan_02:
What? Isn’t there, like, an elevator or something?
And wait, did you say [VAR PKNAME(0001)] can fly?![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1020_hakase_08a:
When you reach the bottom, I will get in touch
once again. I hope your trip is uneventful.[VAR 0114(000B)]
common_1020_hakase_08b:
When you reach the bottom, I will get in touch
once again. I hope your trip is uneventful.[VAR 0114(000E)]
common_1020_friend_01: ...Railroading people into stuff, just like always.[VAR 0114(0006)]

common_1020_friend_02: I guess we’d better go, too...[VAR 0114(0006)]

common_1020_system_stopper:
Everyone is waiting on you to head down!
There’s no turning back now!
